name: Code Green
description:
This is a thing I've been working on for a couple of weeks.

Controls
  • 'A' and 'D': Move Horizontally
  • 'S': Crouch State
  • 'Space Bar': Jump
  • 'S' + 'I': Dive/Run
  • while Diving/Running, 'Spacebar': Cancel Into a Hop
  • 'Q': to add a cartwheel move
  • Move one direction and hold another to do a Cartwheel.
  • 'R': Restart Game
